rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C158113

definition: Terminology relevant to the technique or procedure used to determine how the response or result for an item in a questionnaire, rating, or scale was determined.
name: QRS Method

terms.definition: A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a 11-point numeric rating scale (NRS).
A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a 4-point verbal rating scale (VRS).
A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a 5-point verbal rating scale (VRS).
A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a 6-point verbal rating scale (VRS).
A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a visual analog scale (VAS) 100 mm scale.
A questionnaire, rating and scale (QRS) data type using a visual analog scale (VAS) 50 mm scale.
